i i love logical and rational thinking.

content.text: Hi! I'm looking forward to getting to know you better. I'm a software engineer, and I enjoy playing video games, reading books, and watching movies in my free time. What do you do for fun?

Hello! I'm a student at the University of Virginia, and I'm majoring in Economics and minoring in Public Policy. In my free time, I enjoy reading books about India, baking cupcakes in the kitchen, and wearing comfortable, stylish clothing made from sustainable materials.
That's awesome! I love reading books too, and I've always wanted to learn more about India. I've also been trying to get into baking, but I'm not very good at it yet.
I'm sure you'll get better with practice! And India is a beautiful country with a rich history and culture. I'm sure you'd love to visit someday.
I hope so! It would be amazing to see the Taj Mahal and the other historical sites in person.
It would be! And the food in India is amazing too.
I've heard that! I'm definitely going to have to try some of it when I visit.
I'm excited to hear more about your studies! What are you hoping to do after you graduate?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm interested in working in the public sector. I think I could make a positive impact on people's lives by working in government or a nonprofit organization.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do great things.
Thanks! I'm excited to see what the future holds.
Me too! I'm sure it will be bright for you.
